name.content: TaGaJo strives to create the best and safest play experiences for gamers of all ages. To that end, we require that those wishing to create an account that requires the collection of personally identifiable information must be at least thirteen (13) years old, or have their parent or guardian's express written consent. Please be aware that certain areas of the Websites and certain portion of the Services may contain or provide access to more mature types of content. You may be exposed to some content that you find offensive, indecent, or objectionable. By visiting our Websites or using our Services, you assume all risk. We encourage parents to supervise their children's use of our Websites and Services and maintain open communication regarding appropriate materials for use and viewing by their children.

1. Account Subscription. a. Registration. While some elements of the Websites may be accessible to the public, certain aspects of the Services (e.g., creating a community profile, acquiring a subscription to DandD Insider, posting in forums as well as participating in organized play) require that you register an account. To register an account, you will asked to provide your date of birth and country/region, and then provide your email address as well a username, a screen name and a password; however, to gain access to certain Services (e.g., organized play, invitations to special events, forums, promotions, and prize payments), you may be asked to provide your full name, address, city, state, and country. You agree to: (i) provide accurate, current and complete information about you as may be prompted by any registration forms for the Services ("Registration Data"); and (ii) maintain and promptly update the Registration Data, and any other account-related information you provide to TaGaJo.

b. Passwords; Security. You are entirely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password, and you agree to maintain the security of your password. You also agree not to share your account, screen name, username or password, and agree to notify TaGaJo immediately if you suspect any unauthorized use of your account. You further agree that you are entirely liable for all activities conducted through your account, and are responsible for ensuring that you or your child is aware of, understands, and complies with these Terms of Use and all other rules, policies, or notices published by TaGaJo.
name.smallprint: TaGaJo employees will never ask for your password!

name.content: c. Eligibility. Use of the Services is void where prohibited. By registering an account and using the Services, you represent and warrant that: (i) all Registration Data that you submit is truthful and accurate; (ii) you are thirteen (13) years old or older or have your parenl or guardian's consent as demonstrated by submittal of the appropriate paperwork (available at http://media.TaGaJo.com/downloads/TaGaJoaccount/coppaTaGaJoparentalconsentform_en.pdf) by such parent or guardian; and (iii) your use of the Services does not violate, and you will not use the Services to facilitate the violation of, any applicable law or regulation, these Terms of Use, or any other rules, policies, or notices published by TaGaJo. Your account may be deleted and your access to the Services terminated without warning if we believe that you are under thirteen (13) years old and are using the Services without parental/guardian permission. Please note that the purchase or use of certain Services may have different eligibility requirements, including a higher minimum age requirements, as specified in any additional terms governing such Services.

2. Use of Websites and Services. a. License. Subject to your compliance with these Terms of Use, the Websites, Services, "fan kits" policies, play test materials and other TaGaJo' offerings are provided to you on a nonexclusive, fully revocable basis for your individual, non-commercial use solely for entertainment purposes.
name.smallprint: The Websites and Services are for your personal use and may not be used in connection with any commercial endeavors. Illegal or unauthorized use of the Websites or Services including collecting players' usernames or email addresses for the purpose of sending unsolicited email is strictly prohibited. Commercial advertisements (via emails, forums, etc.) and other forms of solicitation in violation of these Terms of Use may be removed from the Websites and Services without notice and may result in termination of your account.
